title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 922.2 - Factor of safety
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 922.2 - Factor of safety

State Regulations

The lowest factor of safety to be used for locomotive
boilers and steam reservoirs shall be four. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
922.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
